front.title: CGA-TSIG/e: Algorithms for Secure DNS Authentication and Optional DNS Confidentiality

abstract.t: This document describes a new mechanism for secure DNS authentication and DNS data confidentiality in case it is necessary (DNS privacy). The purpose of this document is to reduce human interaction during different DNS scenarios such as the communications of resolvers to stub resolvers, recursive resolvers to Authoritative Name Server, Dynamic DNS updates, (especially updating PTR and FQDN records). The aim of this document to assist DNSSEC to protect the last miles of Internet easier. This document supports both IPv4 and IPv6 enabled networks.
